content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Push the limits and challenge online players to No-limit Texas Hold’em Poker.
• Multiplayer action up to 6 players with “live” audio and video in open games and Sit’n’go style tournaments with worldwide play in 8 languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian.
• Video-compatible with PLAYSTATION®Eye and EyeToy™.
• Search for games by region, language, or both.
• Online leader boards and in-depth hand statistics including percentages of hands played and won, flops seen, checks, calls, bets, and more.
• Customizable characters.
• Point system to unlock features.
• Offline single–player quick match or season play with Turbo mode.
• Supports both Standard and High Definition.
• Two free add-ons coming soon for over 10 poker games including
No-limit Texas Hold'em, Limit Texas Hold'em, Super Hold'em, Billabong, Tahoe, Shanghai, Omaha, Pineapple, Crazy Pineapple, 5-Card Draw, 7-Card Stud, and more.
• Earn up to 30 trophies.

1 player
PSP Compatible
Network Features
Network Players 2-6
PlayStation®Eye camera optional

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). This item may be solely used on up to 2 PlayStation® systems activated by this account, with no more than 1 activated device within a 24 hour period.  Content may not be used by any other account.  Please see software description for device compatibility.
